summary: Makes Imperial skill bonuses closer to that of Oblivion.
descriptionHtml:
When I read the description for the Imperial race, it read \" they have proved to be shrewd diplomats and traders\". I was suprised when I found out they had no Speech bonuses. Talk about false advertising. So, I made this mod. All this mod does is change the skill bonuses for Imperials. No other race is changed. Imperial Luck and Voice of the Emperor are unchanged.
Speech +10
Illusion +5
Restoration +5
One Handed +5
Block +5
Heavy Armor +5
author: deadlyman204
